General.Name: Fujian Sanmu Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Sanmu Group Co., Ltd. engages in the import and export trading business in China. It is also involved in the real estate development; and property operation management and venture capital business. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Fuzhou, China.
General.Address: IFC Fuzhou International Finance Center, Fuzhou, China, 350009
